A

add(int) - Method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Adds an entity to the system, marking it as active for processing.

C

canStay(Entity) - Method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Checks if an entity can stay in the system based on its component flags.
clear() - Method in class ecs.EntityIndexQueue
Clears the queue, resetting the enqueue and dequeue indices.
Component - Class in ecs
The `Component` class is a base class for components in an Entity-Component-System (ECS) architecture.
Component() - Constructor for class ecs.Component
Constructs a new `Component` instance, assigning a unique index based on its class.
ComponentMapper<T> - Class in ecs
The `ComponentMapper` class is a specialized array for mapping components to their respective entities in an Entity-Component-System (ECS) architecture.
ComponentMapper(Class<T>) - Constructor for class ecs.ComponentMapper
Constructs a new `ComponentMapper` instance for a specific component type.
create() - Method in class ecs.ECS
Creates a new entity or reuses a recycled entity from the pool.

E

ecs - package ecs
 
ECS - Class in ecs
The ECS (Entity-Component-System) class represents a simple entity-component-system framework for managing game entities, their components, and systems that process these entities.
ECS(EntitySystem...) - Constructor for class ecs.ECS
Constructs an ECS instance with the specified systems.
Entity - Class in ecs
The `Entity` class represents an entity in an Entity-Component-System (ECS) architecture.
Entity() - Constructor for class ecs.Entity
 
EntityIndexQueue - Class in ecs
The `EntityIndexQueue` class represents a queue of unused indices in an Entity-Component-System (ECS) architecture.
EntityIndexQueue() - Constructor for class ecs.EntityIndexQueue
Constructs a new `EntityIndexQueue` instance with an initial capacity.
EntitySystem - Class in ecs
The `EntitySystem` class is an abstract base class for systems in an Entity-Component-System (ECS) architecture.
EntitySystem(Class<? extends Component>...) - Constructor for class ecs.EntitySystem
Constructs an `EntitySystem` instance with the specified component classes.

G

Retrieves the value at the specified index in the queue.

getIndex() - Method in class ecs.Entity

getMapper(Class<? extends Component>) - Method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Retrieves the component mapper associated with a given component class.
getSystems(Class<? extends Component>) - Static method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Retrieves a set of systems associated with a given component class.

P

pop() - Method in class ecs.EntityIndexQueue
Pops an index from the queue.
process() - Method in class ecs.ECS
Processes all systems, allowing them to update and operate on entities.
process() - Method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Processes all active entities, invoking the specific logic implemented in the subclass.
process(int) - Method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses, defining the logic to be executed on each entity.
push(int) - Method in class ecs.EntityIndexQueue
Pushes an index back into the queue for reuse.

R

remove(int) - Method in class ecs.EntitySystem
Removes an entity from the system, marking it as inactive for processing.
remove(Entity) - Method in class ecs.ECS
Removes an entity from the ECS, recycling its index and returning it to the entity pool.
